moderation.name: ban
moderation.description: Ban a member from the server.

moderation.name: unban
moderation.description: Unban a member from the server using their ID.

moderation.name: kick
moderation.description: Kick a member from the server.

moderation.name: timeout
moderation.description: Temporarily mute a member from sending messages.

moderation.name: lock
moderation.description: Prevent everyone from sending messages in the channel.

moderation.name: unlock
moderation.description: Allow everyone to send messages in the channel.

moderation.name: hide
moderation.description: Hide the current channel from everyone.

moderation.name: show
moderation.description: Make the current channel visible for everyone.

moderation.name: rshow
moderation.description: Allow a specific role to see the current channel.

moderation.name: rhide
moderation.description: Hide the current channel from a specific role.

moderation.name: role
moderation.description: Give or remove a specific role from a member.

moderation.name: roleall
moderation.description: Give a specific role to all members who have another role.

moderation.name: unroleall
moderation.description: Remove a specific role from all members in the server.

moderation.name: deleter
moderation.description: Delete a specific role from the server.

moderation.name: nick
moderation.description: Change a member's nickname.

moderation.name: add
moderation.description: Grant a member access to the current text channel.

moderation.name: remove
moderation.description: Remove a member from the current text channel.

moderation.name: clear
moderation.description: Delete a specific number of messages (default: 100).

moderation.name: bad
moderation.description: Add a new word to the blocked words list.

moderation.name: rbad
moderation.description: Remove a word from the blocked words list.

moderation.name: badlist
moderation.description: Display all blocked words in the list.

moderation.name: send_rules
moderation.description: Send the server rules to the rules channel.

moderation.name: setup
moderation.description: Initialize and configure the server

moderation.name: interface
moderation.description: Control and manage temporary voice channels

moderation.name: restart
moderation.description: Restart the bot safely

moderation.name: ticket
moderation.description: Create and manage support tickets

music.name: load
music.description: Play songs saved on the bot

music.name: join
music.description: Make the bot join your voice channel.

music.name: leave
music.description: Make the bot leave the voice channel.

fun.name: flag
fun.description: Flags game - Guess the country from the flag

fun.name: sum
fun.description: Solve a random addition question within 15 seconds.

fun.name: sub
fun.description: Solve a random subtraction question within 15 seconds.

fun.name: mul
fun.description: Solve a random multiplication question within 15 seconds.

fun.name: div
fun.description: Solve a random division question within 15 seconds.

fun.name: fast
fun.description: Type the word faster than anyone else.

utility.name: ping
utility.description: Check the bot's response time (latency).

utility.name: uptime
utility.description: Show how long the bot has been online.

utility.name: botinfo
utility.description: Display detailed information about the bot.

utility.name: server
utility.description: Show detailed information about the server.

utility.name: user
utility.description: View a user's profile, including global and local stats.

utility.name: avatar
utility.description: View a user's avatar/profile picture.

utility.name: banner
utility.description: View a user's banner.

utility.name: rank
utility.description: No description provided.

utility.name: shop
utility.description: Buy a background for your profile

utility.name: credit
utility.description: Check a user's credit balance or transfer credits to them.

utility.name: daily
utility.description: Claim your daily credits (24-hour cooldown).

utility.name: move
utility.description: Move a member to your current voice channel.

utility.name: trust
utility.description: Allow a member to view your voice channel.

utility.name: temp
utility.description: Create a temporary clone of the server.

utility.name: close
utility.description: close the ticket

utility.name: interface
utility.description: No description provided.

utility.name: load
utility.description: No description provided.

utility.name: restart
utility.description: No description provided.

utility.name: help
utility.description: Display a list of all available bot commands with detailed info.

utility.name: gleave
utility.description: Make the bot leave the server.
